verbiage: Out of the office for starters… cause there are no tethers we don't choose for ourselves… except maybe to our laptops
Wherever we find the most inspiration… and a decent wifi connection
In the cloud just about every day but Sunday… and in person just as much as we need to
Our ideas percolate day and night… and we have the tools to capture them when and where they bubble up
Exactly where we love to play most
In the places that matter most
